title: Farallon Island
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Brainard H. Warner [1847-1916], Washington, DC, 1888?; Mary Warner Cooke, his daughter, Washington, DC, 1916; Virginia Parker Cooke Woodward and Mary Warner Cooke Jones, her daughters, Washington, DC, 1970; (sold at Sotheby Parke Bernet, 1973, no. 3498); purchased by Museum, 1973.

Under review by CGK

creator.death_place: Irving (Chautauqua county, New York state, United States)
